Roanoke.LewisGale Medical Center:
LewisGale Medical Center is a hospital in Salem, Virginia, USA. The hospital has 521 beds, and is part of Hospital Corporation of America.


== History ==
LewisGale Medical Center was founded in the early 1900s.


=== Virginia Tech massacre ===
On April 16, 2007, LewisGale Medical Center received victims of the Virginia Tech massacre.
